ingredients: 2  bananas, broken into chunks, 2 cups milk,   +   1/2 cup peanut butter, 2 tablespoons honey, or to taste, 2 cups ice cubes
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 5g 25%, Cholesterol 10mg 3%, Sodium 203mg 9%, Total Carbohydrate 34g 12%, Dietary Fiber 4g 13%, Total Sugars 25g, Protein 13g, Vitamin C 5mg 27%, Calcium 164mg 13%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 610mg 13%
